item.title: Why Was Mitch McConnell Hospitalized? What to Know About the U.S. Senator’s Deteriorating Health
item.description: Sen. Mitch McConnell admitted himself to the hospital with "flu-like symptoms" in February 2026

item.title: Christine Taylor Admits She Was Already 'Done' with “Hey Dude” When She Learned Show Was Ending, Explains “Saved by the Bell ”Outfit Repeat
item.description: The actress pulled from her own wardrobe for the two TV moments

item.title: Giada De Laurentiis's Daughter Jade Helps Her Pack for the Olympics and Jokes She Wasn't Invited
item.description: “Yes, I gave you the invite. You said you had school,” the celebrity chef told her teenage daughter

item.title: Lindsey Vonn's Teammate Defends Her Decision to Compete at Olympics on Torn ACL
item.description: Breezy Johnson said "more athletes have competed without an ACL than you think" in response to a fan

item.title: Chris Noth Says He’s ‘Lucky’ Big Was Killed Off at the Beginning of “And Just Like That…” in Latest Jab at Sarah Jessica Parker
item.description: Noth was dropped from the HBO Max show after allegations of sexual assault connected to him surfaced
